description: Try our easy to follow Bread & Butter Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bread & Butter Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake pudding for 3035 minutes or until custard is set. Dust with icing sugar and serve with thick cream. Tip 1: Replace the butter with jam for roly poly bread & butter pudding. Tip 2: Scatter 1/2 cup toasted walnuts or flaked almonds over the pudding before baking if you like. Tip 3: Replace the fruit loaf with other leftover bread. If using white bread, add ground cinnamon or nutmeg to the custard mixture.
